text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6378c4fef37df05c99e8a43616063b4ddb692876|patch 8.2.0641: Vim9:  not expanded in :hardcopy and syn-include>
patch 8.2.0641: Vim9:  not expanded in :hardcopy and syn-include

Problem:    Vim9:  not expanded in :hardcopy and "syntax include".
Solution:   Add the EX_EXPAND flag.  Expend "syntax include".

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0641: Vim9:  not expanded in :hardcopy and syn-include · vim/vim@6378c4f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0641: Vim9:  not expanded in :hardcopy and syn-include · vim/vim@6378c4f
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: not expanded in :hardcopy and "syntax include". Solution: Add the EX_EXPAND flag. Expend "syntax include".

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7d41aa8874a62eb399e13b94add7f0e5c4dd074b|patch 8.2.0642: Vim9: using invalid index>
patch 8.2.0642: Vim9: using invalid index

Problem:    Vim9: using invalid index.
Solution:   Check index for being valid.  Fix memory leak.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0642: Vim9: using invalid index · vim/vim@7d41aa8
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0642: Vim9: using invalid index · vim/vim@7d41aa8
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: using invalid index. Solution: Check index for being valid. Fix memory leak.

patch 8.2.0643: terminal uses brown instead of dark yellow

Problem:    Terminal uses brown instead of dark yellow. (Romain Lafourcade)
Solution:   Use color index 3 instead of 130. (closes #5993)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0643: terminal uses brown instead of dark yellow · vim/vim@e297802
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0643: terminal uses brown instead of dark yellow · vim/vim@e297802
attachments.text: Problem: Terminal uses brown instead of dark yellow. (Romain Lafourcade) Solution: Use color index 3 instead of 130. (closes #5993)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/07b761a012958ca91fa420f9c86a33675ddca943|patch 8.2.0645: MS-Windows terminal: CTRL-C does not get to child job>
patch 8.2.0645: MS-Windows terminal: CTRL-C does not get to child job

Problem:    MS-Windows terminal: CTRL-C does not get to child job.
Solution:   Remove CREATE_NEW_PROCESS_GROUP from CreateProcessW(). (Nobuhiro
            Takasaki, closes #5987)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0645: MS-Windows terminal: CTRL-C does not get to child job · vim/vim@07b761a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0645: MS-Windows terminal: CTRL-C does not get to child job · vim/vim@07b761a
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows terminal: CTRL-C does not get to child job. Solution: Remove CREATE_NEW_PROCESS_GROUP from CreateProcessW(). (Nobuhiro Takasaki, closes #5987)
